venue.name: The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.description:
WERQ is the fiercely fun dance fitness class based on current pop, rock, and hip hop charting music.  High-energy dance steps, expert cuing, and songs you know and love from the radio combine for a uniquely effective cardiovascular WERQout enjoyed by all fitness backgrounds and all levels of dance ability. (The cool thing about the music used, is that you will pick up the routines quick because you will probably already know the songs!)

Bring Water, towel, and sneakers.

$5 Drop in Fee; $40 for 10-Class Card.

 

Directions: I-84 West, Sission Avenue Exit, Take a left on Sission Ave. Take a left on Capitol Ave. The 3rd right is Arbor St.  It is in the same building as Real Artways.  Use the side green door entrance.  There is plenty of parking in the back.
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the same building as The Real Artways

group.name: Zumba Fitness @ The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.name: WERQ in Hartford CT
